    • welcomePage

      @GetMapping("/") public String welcomePage()
      Displays the welcome page.
      Returns:
      the name of the welcome view template

    • menuHomePage

      @GetMapping("/home") public String menuHomePage(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Displays the home page with categories and cart details.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to which the categories and cart details will be added
      session - the HTTP session containing cart information
      Returns:
      the name of the home view template

    • categoryHomePage

      @GetMapping("/category/{id}") public String categoryHomePage(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Displays the category page with the selected category and cart details.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the category to be displayed
      model - the model to which the category and cart details will be added
      session - the HTTP session containing cart information
      Returns:
      the name of the category view template or an error page if the category is not found

    • myOrders

      @GetMapping("/orders") public String myOrders(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Displays the user's orders page.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to which the orders and cart details will be added
      session - the HTTP session containing cart information
      Returns:
      the name of the orders view template

    • orderDetails

      @GetMapping("/orders/{id}") public String orderDetails(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Displays the details of a specific order.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the order to be displayed
      model - the model to which the order details and cart information will be added
      session - the HTTP session containing cart information
      Returns:
      the name of the order details view template

    • main

      @GetMapping("/menu") public String main(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the main menu page with categories.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to which the categories will be added
      Returns:
      the name of the main menu view template

    • loginPage

      @GetMapping("/login") public String loginPage(@RequestParam(value="error",required=false) String error, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the login page with an optional error message.
      Parameters:
      error - an optional error message indicating login failure
      model - the model to which the error message will be added if present
      Returns:
      the name of the login view template

    • showAddUserForm

      @GetMapping("/adduser") public String showAddUserForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form for adding a new user.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to which a new User object will be added
      Returns:
      the name of the add user view template

    • addUser

      @PostMapping("/adduser") public String addUser(@Valid @Valid User user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object to be added
      result - the binding result for validation
      model - the model to which error messages will be added if present
      Returns:
      a redirect to the login page or the add user form with error messages

    • addCart

      @PostMapping("/cart/add") public String addCart(@RequestParam("dishId") Long dishId, @RequestParam("categoryId") Long categoryId, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds a dish to the cart.
      Parameters:
      dishId - the ID of the dish to be added
      categoryId - the ID of the category the dish belongs to
      session - the HTTP session containing cart information
      Returns:
      a redirect to the category page

    • decreaseCart

      @PostMapping("/cart/decrease") public String decreaseCart(@RequestParam("dishId") Long dishId, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Decreases the quantity of a dish in the cart.
      Parameters:
      dishId - the ID of the dish to be decreased
      session - the HTTP session containing cart information
      Returns:
      a redirect to the home page

    • deleteFromCart

      @PostMapping("/cart/delete") public String deleteFromCart(@RequestParam("dishId") Long dishId, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Removes a dish from the cart.
      Parameters:
      dishId - the ID of the dish to be removed
      session - the HTTP session containing cart information
      Returns:
      a redirect to the home page

    • deleteAllCart

      @PostMapping("/cart/delete/all") public String deleteAllCart(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Clears all items from the cart.
      Parameters:
      session - the HTTP session containing cart information
      Returns:
      a redirect to the home page

    • checkoutCart

      @PostMapping("/cart/checkout") public String checkoutCart(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Checks out the cart and creates an order.
      Parameters:
      session - the HTTP session containing cart information
      Returns:
      a redirect to the order details page or the home page if the order creation fails
